title: Latvian salad
description: The creamy, tangy dressing and chopped herbs are the stars of this Latvian salad. You can swap the vegetables to your taste, swapping beetroot for tomato, for example. If you can’t find Latvian cheese, feta works perfectly well as a substitute.
ingredients: 2 large handfuls dark salad leaves including spinach
small bunch of dill, leaves only
small bunch of parsley, leaves only
small bunch of mint, leaves only
1 tbsp lemon juice or wine vinegar
½ garlic clove, crushed or finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
